abstract: In a surprise move, SAB issues its second-quarter trading update a week ahead of schedule.
snippet: In a surprise move, SAB issues its second-quarter trading update a week ahead of schedule.
lead_paragraph: It has been three weeks since news broke that Anheuser-Busch InBev, the Budweiser beer company, was considering a $100 billion takeover of SABMiller. Until SABMiller’s second-quarter trading statement on Tuesday, there was nothing much about the potential deal for shareholders to chew on. But the ostensibly ordinary sales update has changed that.

headline.main: SABMiller’s Trading Statement May Alter Potential Budweiser Bid
